originalText.text:
My husband and I were staying with friends in Southampton and our host( who‚Äôs skin looks like it has never seen the sun) had asked us if we wanted to partake in the treatments she was about to have from Pr√™t √† Peau. I didn‚Äôt really feel like leaving her amazing beach house for some ‚Äúnon-ablative‚Äù resurfacing as she called it, but she was like ‚ÄúNo! They come here!‚Äù
So obviously why not? My husband said he‚Äôll pass until she told him they also do low level laser therapy for pain ( he has terrible tennis shoulder ) so he agreed too!
Two lovely women showed up - I think one was the owner, set up in like 10 min and my husband and I went first.
My treatment (I got the RF microneedling since I slather SPF 100 on and sit under an umbrella anyway) - 3 days later I looked like my college self! I‚Äôm 45! It was so good! The pain was 3/5 but so worth it! My husband‚Äôs shoulder felt better and we both bought packages for when we‚Äôre back in the city! Thank you to our host ( you know who you are üòâ) and to Pr√™t team! What an amazing treat!

originalText.text: My regular skincare routine was nonexistent last year during quarantine and NYC closures. Luckily, as soon as it opened back up last summer, I found Evie and Pr√™t √† Peau. She came to my house in East Hampton and did a series of non ablative lasers over the course of 6 weeks, which completely transformed my dull pandemic skin. As a woman of color it‚Äôs really hard to find businesses working with lasers safe for dark skin tones, and Pr√™t √† Peau really makes that a priority. Now that I‚Äôm back in the city, Evie comes to my apartment! Thank you a million times you saved this girl‚Äôs skin!!

originalText.text: So happy I discovered this service because I hate waiting around for my appointments or walking out with a red face after a laser treatment. I had Pr√™t √† Peau come to my vacation house and was pleased to know that the owner was performing the services (laser hair removal and HIFU). Cannot wait for my new treatment with Pr√™t √†  and getting a package my sister, too!! Highly recommend!! Thank you for making me feel so special!!!

originalText.text: Pret a Peau is a god sent. The owner, Evie is extremely knowledgeable, friendly, and professional. Her flexibility with scheduling, and understanding of skin concerns put her above any other laser technician I've worked with. She used the YAG laser for my sunspots and discoloration and after my second appointment they were gone. I couldn't recommend her services enough!

originalText.text: I heard about this service through a beauty editor friend and since I literally cannot make appointments for these things without canceling them due to last minute work issues I decided to schedule an at home service for laser hair removal - bikini and underarm - before a trip. Evie, the owner showed up with a compact device and after 1 session I can tell this is gonna be my go to. She came on time (there are 30 min windows for appointments) and I was totally ok with a virtual stranger in my apartment. She was friendly and didn't promise the moon when I asked her what I can do for the few acne scars on my cheeks. I think she's only dong the appointments before her staff is ready and her new venue opens. Def get an appt. with her if you can!
